card.name: Arathorn II
card.text: Unique. +1 EI against Elves and Dúnedain. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. +2 EI against the Rangers of the North faction. -2 mp if eliminated. If Arathorn II is the highest mind Dúnadan in the company and bears a unique weapon, he becomes a leader and receives +1 to his CP..

card.name: Ardagor
card.text: Unique. Half-troll. Leader. Can use spirit- magic. +2 prowess against Orcs. +2 EI against Trolls. Discard on a body check result of 9. Unless he is at a Darkhaven [K], discard any Orc characters in his company.

card.name: Ardagor
card.text: Unique. Half-troll. Warlord. Leader. Can use spirit-magic. +2 prowess against Orcs. +5 EI against Trolls. When he is at his home site, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. Discard any Orc characters in his company. tap: take Warlord’s Lair from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Brandir
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves.You may take Brandir to your hand from your discard pile or play deck after a successful influence attempt against the Rangers of the North faction.

card.name: Brutal Retinue
card.text: Warlord only. Half-troll. May not be among your starting characters. Discard on a body check result of 9. Must be controlled by a Warlord EI (ignore any race restrictions in company composition). Discard if not controlled by a Warlord, or to cancel a strike against his controlling Warlord.

card.name: Brutal Retinue
card.text: Half-troll. May not be among your starting characters unless you start your avatar. Must be controlled by a Warlord’s EI (ignore any race restrictions in company composition). Discard on a body check result of 9. Discard if not controlled by a Warlord, or to cancel a strike against his controlling Warlord.

card.name: Brutal Retinue
card.text: Half-troll. May not be among the starting characters (unless you start the game with your avatar). Discard to cancel a strike against his controlling War-lord, or if he is not controlled by a War-lord (outside the organization phase). Must always be assigned a strike from an attack before any strike can be assigned to his controlling War-lord.

attr.value: any of your War-lords' home sites

card.name: Forest-troll
card.text: Forest-troll. Discard on a body check result of 7. +1 prowess against Ents and Awakened Plants.-1 to his CPC.

attr.value: any non-Dragon's lair Ruins & Lairsin a Wilderness

card.name: Gilraen
card.text: Unique. +4 EI against Aragorn II and Arathorn II. Against Nazgûl, + 5 to her prowess and his body is halved (round up). If Gilraen is at the same site as Arathorn II, you may take Estel from your sideboard to your hand.

card.name: Ognor
card.text: Unique. Hill-troll. +2 prowess against Giants, Ents and Awakened Plants. Discard on a body check result of 8.

card.name: Ranger of Arnor
card.text: May not be among the starting characters. May also be played at any non-Shadow-hold site in Cardolan or Rhudaur. Discard him if you have Bad Company in play.

card.name: Troll Henchman
card.text: Mountain-troll. Only one Troll Henchman may be in the company for each Troll leader and/ or avatar in the company. +1 to his company’s size for the purpose of playing and interpreting resources. If Troll Henchman is at a Free-hold [F] in a region adjacent to the regions affected by Grond, then Grond also affects that site.

attr.value: any site with a Troll automatic-attack

card.name: Ufkral
card.text: Unique. Uruk-hai. Discard on a body check result of 7. +1 EI against Orcs. +2 EI against Snaga-hai and Wolf factions. If Ufrkal controls a wolf ally, he becomes a leader. wolf allies he controls may take trophies. A wolf ally controlling one trophy gains the scout skill; controlling three trophies it gains the ranger skill.
